body_text: Hi Paromita & Alex,      Mukesh has shared the THIN and SUPERTHIN creatives for the “Send Money” promotion.  Since it’s not feasible to communicate the complete message on a superthin creative, we’ve also created a thin —assuming we can promote this on the Home Page rather than just the Send Money page.
body:
Hi Paromita & Alex,

Mukesh has shared the THIN and SUPERTHIN creatives for the “Send Money” promotion.
Since it’s not feasible to communicate the complete message on a superthin creative, we’ve also created a thin —assuming we can promote this on the Home Page rather than just the Send Money page.
